Hey thanks for the info..I have heard good things
about this book from a few other ladies. I didn't know

thanks, donna v

> I pre-ordered it and received my copy a week or so

> information, and inspiration. Unschooling is often

> http://www.inspirit.com.au/unschooling/ and more

messages.subject: Welcome Donna!
messages.msgSnippet: ... You will learn a lot here!!!  I d like to recommend a book to you that was just published...   Christian Unschooling - Growing Your Child in the Freedom
messages.messageBody:
> We have always used "school books" but it has never
> been particularly productive(not in the sense of
> instilling a love of learning and curiosity and
> uniqueness and creativity) and I am always trying to
> do without the STRUCTURE of "doing school at home". So
> I am hoping to learn LOTS from you ladies on the
> whole concept of Unschooling(which I had never even
> heard of when we started).

You will learn a lot here!!! I'd like to recommend a book to you that was just published... "Christian Unschooling - Growing Your Child in the Freedom of Christ," by Teri Brown and Elissa Wahl. I pre-ordered it and received my copy a week or so ago. It is a wonderful source of encouragement, information, and inspiration. Unschooling is often misunderstood by many Christians and it is sometimes hard to find other Christian unschoolers. Teri also has a website... http://www.inspirit.com.au/unschooling/ and more info on the book can be found at http://www.championpress.com/unschoolingmain.html.

Welcome again!

Karen
Mama to Emily (12/91), Noah (12/95), Halle (10/98), and Joel (9/00)
http://www.geocities.com/heartland/2358
mailto:careermom@...
